runs.comm: length wide of off stump, it swings after Rutherford leaves it along and deceives Buttler who spills it
same delivery, Rutherford aims a slash at it and misses
touch shorter, dabbed down to third man

inside edge and caught behind Buttler goes to his right to take the catch and Rankin has his first wicket for England. It nipped back off the seam from a decent length, at 90mph too, and Franklin was very late on it and didn't move his feet either, little inside edge and well taken
fails to adjust for the right-hander
back of a length outside off, left alone, bit of bounce there
fuller and driven down the ground past mid-off, nice timing
leg stump on a length and clipped over backward square leg, nicely timed, well picked up that
back of a length on off stump, blocked up towards mid-off, no run
picked up over the leg side again and this time into the stands, shot, length on middle and leg and whipped over the fielder on the boundary, superbly timed
and now over mid-off to a fuller ball just outside off stump, lovely hitting, full blade of the bat and a one-bounce four
good length on off stump, dabbed into the covers and they take a quick single
touch of width outside off stump, hammered through cover point, powerful strike played with fast hands standing tall
couple of steps down the pitch, swing and a miss outside off
just outside off, dabbed square and it races wide of third man, short boundary there but that has whistled into it, using the pace was Rutherford
flashes at to a wider line and it bounces a little over the stroke
swung off the stumps over midwicket and it runs into the fence, a bit of a heave across the line but very effective again
full ball on the stumps, angled down to third man
another full ball on the stumps, McCullum gets it to the cover fielder playing forward
full and wide, slapped to point and dropped a quick chance reaching up with two hands but Bopara got there but could only parry it, should have been taken
full on middle, flicked out through midwicket, a huge boundary that side so they get two as deep square has to come in a long way
down the wicket and a big swing a miss, goes past the leg stump
full, just outside off stump, swung at and missed again
full on the stumps again, McCullum aims at the leg side and gets a leading edge over the bowler's head, mid-off can't get in in time
full and wide, slapped over extra cover and it runs into the long boundary, room to flash the arms and Rutherford needs no invitation, well struck
very full on off stump, driven to mid-off
length ball on the stumps, McCullum pulls and gets another top edge but this one flies over the wicketkeeper into the stands, beaten for pace but it's sailed into the terraces
goes again but this time misses completely and strikes the thigh pad
length ball on middle, McCullum forward and plays wide of mid-on
length ball, blocked up the wicket from a good length
full on the leg stump, flicked at and it comes off the pad through to Buttler
length just outside off, a slower ball, cracked to point
down the wicket, another slower ball at 69mph, McCullum sees it, waits for it and plays a very correct punch down the ground that runs past mid-on for four, nice timing
big slash and miss to a full ball outside off
length on off stump, pushed into the covers from the crease
full on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket coming half-forward
pulled from just back of a length, well saved from Rankin down low at short long leg
leg stump and full, clipped down to long leg
full on the stumps, pushed down to long off
full and wide, swung over the off side, mid-off goes back as it lands a few yards short of the extra-cover boundary
yorker-length just outside off, dug back to the bowler
length ball flashed at just outside off, gets it wide of third man for a couple
length ball on the stumps, pushed through midwicket
length on off stump, Rutherford goes back and punches out to deep cover
McCullum plays the same stroke to the same ball
a touch fuller, slog swept and into the seats, it was a touch flatter and Rutherford was onto it, lovely stroke
and now down the wicket and playing a controlled lofted on-drive that finds the crowd again
wider on the crease, angled in a little, Rutherford can only pat this back to him
paddle swept and gets a single wide of the 45
slower ball miles wide of off stump
gets this on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
another slower ball, this time down the leg side
length just outside off stump, Rutherford punched down to long off
length ball, played forward and pushed out to deep cover
full and pushed through the on side
too wide and cracked past backward point, another powerful flash of the blade
full and wide again, flashed at again, another good connection, almost too good as it nearly carries to the deep cover, once bounce to him
down the track, mistimed aerial stroke but a bit of a leading edge flies over extra-cover and Bopara at long-off has to be sharpish to save four
enough length to pull off the stumps, Woakes around from deep-backward square leg
reverse sweep off the stumps, gets it to short third man
flat delivery on the stumps, swung across the line and gets it past the 45, four more and fifty in just 28 balls, what an innings
length ball wide of off stump, step back and heaved wide of long-off, gets a couple more
in the slot outside off stump and Rutherford times the pants off it over long off, lovely hitting
shot! full just outside off and bang over extra-cover, superb strike, timing is superb, gets deep in the crease and down on one knee and bang away it goes
goes away, this time doesn't time it to extra-cover, Morgan throws and would have ran out Rutherford at the non-striker's end had he it
slower ball goes wrong down the leg side
more width and struck again over the covers, wide of the sweeper for a couple, didn't time it perfectly
swing and miss outside off stump aiming leg side
full toss outside off and a swing and a miss again aiming over the leg side
short and pulled, Hales at deep square leg, missed it with his hands but luckily for him his boot got in the way to save four
full and just outside off stump, gets it to extra-cover and Morgan misses it with a dive so they get runs wide of the deep cover
yorker length outside off, missed and Buttler takes it well
wide full toss, flashed at but Bopara makes a superb diving save at backward point, probably saved four
yorker length again, just outside off stump, dug to point

very full again, just outside off stump, Rutherford tries to clear the stands again but finds long-off and that is reward for a good over with Rutherford not content to just play out the decent set, going for the big one, not timing it and finding the fielder for a comfortable catch
length on off stump, flicked through midwicket and that's fifty from 36 balls for McBren
poor line, off the pad and four to fine leg
almost same again but this takes more of the pad and runs closer to long leg
full on the stumps, pushed in range of mid-on who slides and saves the single
length ball on the stumps, pushed to mid-on for a more comfortable save
foot and a half outside off, pushed out to the deep cover
length just outside off, pushed through point for a single
full ball reverse swept, missed, huge appeal for lbw looks stone dead, not out given, must have been just outside the line, not according to Hawk Eye, no reviews in T20
full just outside off, driven off a thick inside edge that runs through square leg
driven nicely past extra cover, long-off goes to his right to field and they two
full just outside off, dug out through point
low full toss on off stump, pushed down to long off
similar delivery, Taylor drives again and gets a thick outside edge that runs past short third man for four, unlucky Luke
reverse sweep from full just outside off, comes off the back pad to short third man
slower ball, leg side wide, McCullum swings and misses and with the keeper stood up that's four
full just outside off, McCullum steps back in his crease and goes down low and whacks it over long-on, lovely clean strike, well caught in the crowd too
full toss outside off, slapped over extra-cover, poor ball destroyed
steps himself to take a length ball leg side, deep square comes to his left to field, another powerful strike
length well outside off, Taylor slashes and misses and nearly falls out of his ground
off stump on a length, pushed down to long off
bang over extra-cover again, a little width and he throws his hands at it and powers it over the fielder, great timing again
full ball pushed wide of the cover sweep with that huge boundary, easy two
off stump on a decent length, flicked down to long-on
backs away a little, Wright follows him, McCullum whips him to backward square
full ball on the stumps, dug out down to long on, just needs to give McBren the strike at the moment

McCullum gives himself room but receives a yorker that cleans him up. Excellent yorker from Wright, right in the blockhole, at the off stump, McCullum has shuffled away to open up the off side but got a delivery too good to hit and the entertainment ends
full just outside off, punched down to long on
bumper on the stumps, Latham gets hit high on the pad trying to sort of paddle it around the corner, hurried
short again but leg side
length on off stump, tucked down to third man
full ball that tails in a little, driven out to deep cover
length delivery slides past the off stump with Latham trying to glance down to third man
hurried again on the pull comes off the splice and bloops it over midwicket for a couple as the sweeper comes in and to his right
short, again pulled, again beaten for pace but this is top-edged for six, over a very fine fine leg region, ruins a good over
full ball on the stumps, toe-ended through cover
full just outside off stump, dug out down the ground, long-off comes in and saves two
full ball on middle and leg, a flick down the ground but it sails into the stands for a flat six, what timing, that flew
full toss outside off, slapped hard wide of the cover sweeper who gets down with a big right hand and saves four, super work
another full toss outside off, this a bit lower and slugged down to long-off
yorker-length on the stumps, dug back to the bowler
length on middle stump, dabbed to third man staying leg side of it
whoops, high full toss outside off, slapped to cow corner, once bounce four, well struck
yorker length just outside off, dug out down to third man
step to leg and tries to flick a back of a length ball over the off side, misses
slower ball, slugged from off stump through midwicket, they come back on a fumble
length ball wide of off stump, Latham clears the front leg but gets it off the toe to extra cover
full length wide of off stump, swung at and missed, too wide was it? No just inside the guideline
same line, a little fuller, swung hard at and gets a wild outside edge that runs past Buttler for four, pure fortune that
even fuller and well wide of off stump, Southee-esque, goes to dig it out and misses
swung into the deep over cover from another full wide ball, Stokes comes in at deep cover and doesn't judge it properly, then slips and then does well to save four

another full wide ball, swung at, straight up in the air and Bopara takes it well at point. Went high up and it swirled around in the air and Bopara had to judge it well and take it with two hands inverted dropping down onto one knee
full and straight, dug out to deep cover
